symptomAnalyzerDescription: Describe your symptoms below. Our AI will provide informational suggestions for over-the-counter medicines and potential next steps. This is not medical advice.
symptomsPlaceholder: e.g., 'I have a headache, runny nose, and slight cough for the last 2 days.' Please be as detailed as possible, but do not include personal identifiable information.
analysisResultsDescription: Below are AI-generated informational suggestions based on the symptoms you provided.
suggestedMedicalSpecialtyInfo: Based on your symptoms, you might consider consulting a {specialty}.
suggestedMedicalSpecialtyDisclaimer: This is an AI-generated suggestion and not a formal referral. Always consult a healthcare professional for medical advice.
suggestedMedicinesInfo: The following are general suggestions and not medical advice. Always read product labels and consult a healthcare professional before taking any medication, especially if you have pre-existing conditions or are taking other drugs.
noMedicineSuggestionsInfo: The AI could not identify specific over-the-counter medicine suggestions based on the provided symptoms, or the symptoms may require professional medical assessment. Please consult a healthcare provider.
errorDuringAnalysisMessage: An error occurred while analyzing your symptoms.
validationFailedMessage: Validation failed. Please check the fields.
validationMaxChars: Please enter no more than {count} characters.
validationLocationMinChars: Location must be at least {count} characters.
validationLocationMaxChars: Location must be no more than {count} characters.
validationSpecialtyMaxChars: Specialty must be no more than {count} characters.
footerDisclaimer: This tool provides informational suggestions and is not a substitute for professional medical advice. Always consult with a qualified healthcare provider for any health concerns or before making any decisions related to your health or treatment.
locationPlaceholderPathology: e.g., 'Los Angeles, CA' or 'Tech Park Area'
errorDuringSearchMessage: An error occurred while searching for {entity_plural}.
aiGeneratedDataDisclaimer: The information below is AI-generated for illustrative purposes and may not be real or accurate. {location}{specialtyString}. {disclaimer}
noDataGenerated: AI could not generate {entity} examples for '{location}'{specialtyString}. Try a different location or broaden your search.
createPostDescription: Fill in the details below to publish a new article to the MediSeek blog.
postTitlePlaceholder: Enter the title of your blog post
postContentPlaceholder: Write your blog post content here...
postExcerptPlaceholder: Write a short summary or teaser for your post...
totalPostsDescription: Number of articles published on the blog.
welcomeAdminDescription: Oversee and manage MediSeek application content and settings.
dashboardOverviewContent: This is your central hub for managing blog posts, viewing site statistics (mock data), and other administrative tasks. Use the sidebar to navigate to different sections.
deleteConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the post "{postTitle}"? This action cannot be undone.
blogPostDeletionErrorNotFound: Post not found or already deleted.
blogPostErrorIdMissing: Post ID is missing. Cannot delete.
noBlogPostsFoundAdminDescription: It looks like there are no blog posts. Why not create the first one?
manageBlogsErrorLoading: An error occurred while loading blog posts for management. Please try again.
editPostDescription: Modify the details of the blog post: "{postTitle}".
blogPostUpdateErrorNotFound: The post you are trying to edit could not be found. It may have been deleted.
validationPostIdRequired: Post ID is required for an update.
postNotFoundMessage: The blog post with the slug '{slug}' could not be found.
